thread.title: Police searching for missing man last seen Friday morning
thread.title_full: Police searching for missing man last seen Friday morning - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Sam Winstrom, Assignment Editor
title: Police searching for missing man last seen Friday morning
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Police are searching for a man reported missing Friday night.
According to NOPD, 39-year-old Shade Sanguis was last seen leaving his residence in the 2600 block of Gravier Street.
Sanguis' wife told police that she saw him leaving their home around 8 a.m. heading to an unknown destination. He has not been seen or heard from since.
Anyone with information on Shade Sanguis' location is asked to call NOPD at 504-821-2222 or First District Detectives at 504- 658-6050.
